Title: Long Sheer Skirt Evening Dress

Sizes: 4, 8, 16, 14, 12, 10, 6

Colors: champagne, off-white

Category: evening

Featured-image: 8763-off-white-long-sheer-skirt-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Mini dress with a sheer neckline that is adorned with sparkling sequins. The same sequin design is patterned throughout the gown. The open back is accented with a covered shinning belt. The skirt is the feature of this gown. It is a tulle full length skirt that is sheer and pleated. Perfect for an evening event.
